text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar 430,000 more people flew from China to the US AFTER your ban. And the European travel ban was worthless, as it only barred non-citizen/legal residents. All others flying in from #COVID19 hot zones came right in. You literally did NOTHING, for WEEKS, beyond these weak travel bans.
